data.name: Wise Arrow
data.effect: Supplement a withering or decisive attack, reducing benefits of cover.

data.name: Sight Without Eyes
data.effect: Ignore visual condition impairments like fog, smoke, and pitch blackness for one attack.

data.name: Blood Without Balance
data.effect: If you are the target of a distract gambit, you can act immediately if your new Initiative would allow it to make a ranged decisive attack up to long range. Gain bonus damage on low Initiative.

data.name: Force Without Fire
data.effect: Supplement a withering attack from short or close range. If you deal at least the enemies‘ Stamina in damage, the Initiative is lost instead of transferred and the enemy knocked back significantly.

data.name: Trance of Unhesitating Speed
data.effect: Attack multiple times against one or more targets, spreading total Initiative between several decisive attacks evenly. Incrase base damage per 10 rolled.

data.name: Phantom Arrow Technique
data.effect: Fire without using ammunition. Use Intimacies to enhance an attack once per scene. Additional special effect available at Essence 3+

data.name: Fiery Arrow Attack
data.effect: Augment a decisive attack to increase damage slightly and make your enemy catch fire if you deal enough damage. Materials hit may catch fire.

data.name: There Is No Wind
data.effect: Ignores penalties from non-visual conditions such as wind. Ignores distance from withering attack.

data.name: Accuracy Without Distance
data.effect: Enhance a ranged attack to complete an aim action immediately and give the aiming bonus.

data.name: Arrow Storm Technique
data.effect: Strike many enemies up to medium range from an initial attack. A single attack is rolled and applied against all targets. Deceisive Attacks only.

data.name: Flashing Vengeance Draw
data.effect: Gain additional successes on Join Battle. The first attack becomes Unblockable.

data.name: Hunter's Swift Answer
data.effect: Unleash a withering or decisive attack when successfully disengaging, even if you have already attacked this turn.

data.name: Immaculate Golden Bow
data.effect: Create a bow from pure Essence that has the same stats as a powerbow. The bow can protect it‘s wielder at a cost. Repurchases allow creation of Evocations.

data.name: Dazzling Flare Attack
data.effect: Supplement Fiery Arrow Attack. If the attack generates at least one 10, it increases raw damage and goes off like an enormous flare visible for miles.

data.name: Seven Omens Shot
data.effect: Special „long aim“ action, converting bonus dice to bonus successes and adds threshold successes to damage for a decisive attack. Killing a traget restores Willpower.

data.name: Revolving Bow Discipline
data.effect: Launch withering attacks against a single chosen enemy until you either miss or crash the enemy. Only within short or close range.

data.name: Finishing Snipe
data.effect: If an enemy within range crashes, you may make a decisive attack against them, even if you already acted this turn.

data.name: Rain of Feathered Death
data.effect: Split a single decisive attack against a target into multiple ones, with each ones damage being reduced by the prior attack.

data.name: Shadow-Seeking Arrow
data.effect: If an enemy is uncovered mid-combat and the Solar is aware of it, he may make a reflexive attack against them. Can be used multiple times when unovering multiple enemies at once.

data.name: Searing Sunfire Interdiction
data.effect: Enables a Gambit that lowers in which tick an enemy may act. Can lead to an enemy loosing his turn entirely. Upgradeable.

data.name: Solar Spike
data.effect: While having higher Initiative than your target, make a decisive attack that ignores range. Has a set raw damage and is incompatible with some other Charms. Does not reset Initiative and may be used once per scene (rechargeable)

data.name: Heart-Eating Incineration
data.effect: Only useable at bonfire-level anima and in combination with Solar Spike. Increases damage of it‘s prerequisite Charm and can burn an enemy‘s soul to restore Essence. Dims the anima.

data.name: Dust and Ash Sleight
data.effect: Allows Seven Omens Shot long action to be quickened at the cost of the normally gained successes.

data.name: Heavens Crash Down
data.effect: Special Clash attack only useable at -4 Health Levels. Gain automatic successes and double 9s. Initiative damage is not gained as Initiative but immediately used in a decisive attack. Upgradeable.

data.name: Streaming Arrow Stance
data.effect: Attack a Crashed target from medium or long range without necessitating an aim action.

data.name: Whispered Prayer of Judgement
data.effect: After using an aim action, add damage to your attack.
